name: Ice Fantasy
overview: The story is set a hundred years after a war between the Empire of Snow (Ice Tribe) and the Fire Tribe, where the Fire Tribe was defeated. However, the war was fatal, leaving Prince Ka Suo and his younger half-brother Ying Kong Shi the only royal heirs and pure-blood ice illusionists left in the Ice Tribe. Conflict ensues after Ka Suo reluctantly ascends to the throne as his lover, Li Luo, and his brother go missing. Ka Suo also accidentally discovers an evil presence lurking in the Ice Tribe's holy shrine. He and his companions enter the mysterious shrine, and defeat head of the shrine, Lady Yuan Ji, only to find out that she has been plotting a conspiracy against him. Ka Suo also experiences hardships in trying to find his lover and brother, not knowing that his brother has lost all of his memories and has become the Fire Prince under his mother's command. A war between the two tribes commences once again, with the two brothers pitted against each other.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Feng Shao Feng and Victoria Song star in a fantastical epic fantasy about love, war and deception during a mythological era when the Ice and Fire tribes battled each other in a long-standing war.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Ice Fantasy Destiny transports the epic fantasy adventure story into a modern day setting. It is the year 2020 and Kasuo has been reincarnated as Feng Suo, the head of a high technology company. He inadvertently unlocks memories of the past and regains his power, thus igniting a new chapter in the history of the ice and fire tribe.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: At his coming-of-age ceremony, reluctant 130-year-old ice prince Ka Suo faces an undesirable future -- as well as a fiery interloper.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Trouble arises during a battle in the Snow Fog Forest, but young Shi has a trick up his sleeve. The Fire King enacts a treacherous plan.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Prince Shi embarks on a potential suicide mission to retrieve the Spirit Devouring Sword. A traitor reveals the Ice Clan's weakness to the Fire King.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: While journeying to the Mortal Kingdom with Shi, Ka Suo has a vision of an apocalyptic future. The Fire King learns the secrets of the ice crystal.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In search of the crystal leaf, Ka Suo and Li Luo trek to the realm of the Healer Tribe. Yun Da looks for Shi but instead finds a dazed man in a lake.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Reunited with the adult Shi, the gang quests further with a Healer prince in tow. But they soon meet a warrior woman who has a bone to pick with Shi.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: While Ka Suo has a run-in with the Tiger Monster, Li Luo and Luna battle a nasty demon themselves. But the crystal leaf lies with a more sinister foe.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ka Suo and Li Luo arrive at the ethereal Dream City, where they are soon tasked with retrieving a lord from a mind-bending inner reality.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: As everyone’s dreams intersect, reality becomes nearly impossible to untangle. Li Luo discovers the truth about Xing Jui.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The Fire King formulates a sinister plot as Ka Suo and Li Luo struggle to escape the dream world. The Dream King’s motives may not be what they seem.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The Fire Clan targets the Bear Clan while Ka Suo visits the Spirit Clan. Yun Fei feels the effects of the heart-burning fruit he was fed.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: While demonic music mesmerizes the mortals, Ka Suo and Li Luo struggle to find the antidote. Yan Da’s emotions get in the way of her duties.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A desperate Yan Da makes a sacrifice in order to save Shi. Princess Lan Shang of the Mermaid Tribe gets a bitter taste of mortality.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Ka Suo races to reach the Predor Mermaid before the Fire Tribe does. But the Fire King has prepared a cruel ordeal for him: a prison of despair.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Ka Suo remains powerless and despondent as the Fire King assumes control of the Ice King’s body, forcing Shi to take matters into his own hands.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The Mermaid Saint agrees to help Shi kill the Fire King under one condition, which leads to tensions between Shi, Yan Da and Lan Shang.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Lian Ji frets over Shi’s involvement with Yan Da. Lan Shang goads Shuo Gang and the Fire King into a duel for her hand in marriage.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: While Lan Shang readies herself for a harrowing wedding day, Ka Suo’s soul journeys to a dark place to retrieve the dangerous Spirit Devouring Sword.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Ka Suo is horrified to learn he’s possessed by the sword spirit. Meanwhile, his love for Li Luo angers the Ice King.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: As Yan Da infiltrates the City of Bladed Snow to meet Shi, Lian Ji becomes more determined to ensure that he takes the throne.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: The decision of who will be the next Ice King proves difficult as deceit and conflicting prophecies complicate matters.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: While the fight for the throne continues to pit brother against brother, the Head Dreamer has a vision that might foretell the future.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: After Ka Suo is attacked by a strange black fog in the mortal realm, Li Luo is banished from the Ice Clan for failing to protect him.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Li Luo prepares to leave for the northern border. Shi realizes he may have to choose between his brother and everyone else in his life.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: The Ice Tribe tries to expedite the naming of a new king when it seems they are under attack. Li Luo attempts to sniff out the Fire Tribe's spy.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Various tribe leaders throw their support behind Ka Suo and Shi. Li Luo stumbles upon the banished She Yin, bringing her one step closer to her goal.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: The battle for the throne commences as Liao Jian challenges Pian Feng, and Lan Shang faces off against Chao Ya.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: The battle for the throne barrels toward its conclusion. Ka Suo learns of a disturbing prophecy that seems to dictate he must win.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Ka Suo struggles to contrive an outcome of the match in which Shi isn't harmed. Li Luo discovers the secrets of She Yin's past.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: After the battle, Ka Suo and Shi must deal with two very different transformations. Xuan Ta and Xing Jiu look for the traitor among the Ice Tribe.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Hoping to cure Ka Suo, Li Luo brings the Fallen Oracle to the Ice Tribe. The Fire King blackmails Shi into helping him conquer the three realms.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Lian Ji's treacherous machinations lead to deadly consequences. Shi prepares for his new role as a leader.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Shi concocts a plan after the Fire King overwhelms an Ice Tribe outpost with arrows. Li Luo begins to avoid a bewildered Ka Suo.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Ka Suo wanders into the forest and finds Li Luo transformed. Ka Suo runs off to be alone with Lan Shang, but not everything is as it seems.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Lan Shang devises an alternative to returning to the ocean. Shi has doubts about his own fitness to be king after an encounter with Yan Da.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: Ka Suo and Li Luo take a stand in order to gain permission to marry. Lan Shang uses the wedding to force Shi into a vulnerable position.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: While Li Luo's soul hangs in the balances, Lan Shang attempts to avoid the consequences of her actions by fleeing Snowblade City.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Shuo Gang reveals the truth about Shi to Ka Suo, who refuses to believe it. A new war between fire and ice may be on the horizon.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: Ka Suo tries to appeal to Shi as the latter makes moves to rescue his mother and Shuo Gang. The Mermaid Saint aims to get her revenge.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: The new Ice King uses his considerable power to restore the Ice Curtain. Lian Ji regains memories of a past she shared with the black fog.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Ka Suo becomes determined to solve the mystery of the ancient god. The Ice Queen springs into action after a mysterious whirlpool appears.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: Ka Suo and Xing Jiu plan to take the fight with the ancient god to Sacred Snow Mountain, a dangerous place where magic is born.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: At the start of a truly mettle-testing journey, the group faces a daunting challenge from the High Priest.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: Yan Da encounters a startlingly familiar sword fairy. The group faces the first of four guardians on Sacred Snow Mountain.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: The group encounters a guardian who prefers to take an uncommon approach. Yan Da strikes a deal with Shi's soul.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: Ka Suo finds himself enchanted by the deceptively beautiful Southern Guardian. Chao Ya wishes to return to the Spirit Land.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: As the group continues to battle the powerful musician Die Che, Yan Da meets with another guardian -- as well as Yuan Ji himself.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: After encountering the evil Northern Guardian at Lightning Altar, Xing Gui finds herself in a crucial role. The group travels to the Mortal Kingdom.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: Xing Gui aids the group via the dream world. Driven by their shared love for Chao Ya, Liao Jian and Pian Feng form a strong bond.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Ka Suo and Chao Ya attempt to lure the West Guardian out from the shadows, but the group is shocked by what they uncover.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: The group faces the daunting task of battling Yuan Ji. But a rift between the all-powerful god and Hidden Lotus may give them a fighting chance.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: The resurrected and transformed Shi craves revenge against Ka Suo. Li Luo and Lan Shang struggle with their new identities.

episodes.name: Episode 53
episodes.overview: As a frustrated Li Luo struggles with her amnesia, a new clan from Spirit Snow Mountain arrives at Ren Xue City.

episodes.name: Episode 54
episodes.overview: Ka Suo becomes determined to make Li Luo remember him. Shi conspires to align the Mermaid Tribe with the Fire Tribe.

episodes.name: Episode 55
episodes.overview: A treacherous Shi returns to Snowblade City to manipulate Ka Suo, who grows increasingly concerned about Li Luo.

episodes.name: Episode 56
episodes.overview: Yan Da raises the possibility to her soul-hungry father of a traitor among the Fire Tribe. Chao Ya faces a formidable challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 57
episodes.overview: Ka Suo faces the prospect of war if he doesn't deliver Lan Shang to the Fire King, forcing him to make a difficult decision.

episodes.name: Episode 58
episodes.overview: While confronting Phoenix and the Fire King, Xing Jiu soon finds himself plunged into the dark realm of the Despair Fire Kingdom.

episodes.name: Episode 59
episodes.overview: Ka Suo must confront Shi in the realm of the Fire Tribe after his brother kidnaps Li Luo and Lan Shang.

episodes.name: Episode 60
episodes.overview: With Ka Suo conveniently out of the way, the Fire King launches an attack on Snowblade City. Meanwhile, Yan Da uncovers her father’s secrets.

episodes.name: Episode 61
episodes.overview: While the completely unhinged Fire King goes on a rampage, Ka Suo has little time to let the Hidden Lotus know his final decision.

episodes.name: Episode 62
episodes.overview: The future of the Ice Tribe and many lives depend on a final battle between brothers Ka Suo and Shi.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Feng Shao Feng and Victoria Song star in a fantastical epic fantasy about love, war and deception during a mythological era when the Ice and Fire tribes battled each other in a long-standing war.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Ice Fantasy Destiny transports the epic fantasy adventure story into a modern day setting. It is the year 2020 and Kasuo has been reincarnated as Feng Suo, the head of a high technology company. He inadvertently unlocks memories of the past and regains his power, thus igniting a new chapter in the history of the ice and fire tribe.
